title: Engineering Design Process Project Through Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Introductory Engineering Concepts and Team Project Experience
context.additional_context: Structured collaborative learning and utilization of smartphone-based collaboration tools in limited technological environments

learning_goals: Students can perform each stage of the engineering design process (problem definition, concept generation, detailed design, evaluation) by applying a four-stage collaborative learning strategy.
Learners can clarify role distribution within a team, complete interdependent tasks, and improve project outcomes by 20%.
Teams can achieve over 80 points based on an evaluation rubric for final design deliverables and attain a team satisfaction score of 4 or higher on a 5-point scale.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
